resources.string:
Next feature release:
 · New: Better keyboard layout while searching for geocaches or trackables on the search activity
 · New: Show whether trackable has been discovered in the past
 · New: Support mapsforge style menus to select desired overlays
 · New: Add link to our users guide on About c:geo page
 · New: Improve color detection for cache listings to automatically switch to lighter background in case of need
 · New: Also support PNG and GIF as log pictures
 · New: Add user option to change max distance up to which brouter is used
 · New: Three colum mainscreen with up to two lines of text each
 · New: Garmin and Groundspeak waypoint IDs can coexist in the same GPX file
 · Fix: Remove outdated Navigon navigation application
 · Fix: Reorder menu items on logging screen to prevent accidental deletion of log
 · Fix: Waypoints on mapsforge map hidden already below configured limit
 Known issue:
 Waypoints from other lists might leak onto the map....we are working on it
 · Fix: Do not forget trackable visited state after device has been rotated on logging screen
 · Fix: Accept mapsforge maps above V3 during offline map file selection
 · Fix: Update links to terms of use and other help pages
 · Fix: Distance parsing for projection in some locales
 · Fix: Wrong error message if basic member tries to open PMO-cache
 · Fix: Hide opencaching waypoints with 0 coordinates
 · Fix: Update OKAPI waypoint types
 · Fix: Avoid doubled OKAPI authentication, which might fail then
 · Fix: Added check for actual username when logging a cache
 
 2018.10.13:
 · Fix: Login problems due to website change
 
 2018.09.17:
 · Fix: Crashes on logging page during server instabilities
 · Fix: Greek translation not working
 · New: Notify the user if coordinate checker of geocaching.com is available via website
 
 2018.08.14:
 · Fix: Login page changed on geocaching.com causing login problems
 
 2018.08.13:
 · Fix: Personal note not downloaded from server
 · Fix: Only 20 trackables where shown when logging a cache
 · Fix: Show closeout warning on Android below 4.1
 Android 4.0 can no longer login to geocaching.com
 · Fix: Direction line was always shown on OSM or offline maps
 
 2018.06.26:
 · New: New mapsforge library (former beta version) now used by default for OSM and offline maps
 Known regressions we are still working on (click for info):
 Circles around caches not yet implemented
 Waypoints of caches might be already hidden below limit
 More caches might be shown with orange circles
 · New: Days since cache has been saved now replaced by months or years when applicable
 · New: Contact owner by clicking on user name now also for OC caches
 · New: Translation to Cebuano and Greek
 · New: Support OC GPX extensions
 · New: Log template [SIZE]
 · New: Also extract waypoints from short description
 · Fix: Turkish translation not working
 · Fix: Rest user modified coords did not restore cache coords locally
 · Fix: Avoid crash after deleting a GPX file on the import screen
 · Fix: GPS was switched off when editing a waypoint
 · Change: Use new gc.com logging page for submitting logs
